body_html:
I ran bazel clean and tried again at head of Master, but I saw exactly the same array mismatch error.

Note that this time I compiled with CUDA 10.0 and cuDNN 7.3 support, using an NVIDIA RTX 2080 Ti (11GB). Everything else is the same.
body_text:
I ran bazel clean and tried again at head of Master, but I saw exactly the same array mismatch error.
Note that this time I compiled with CUDA 10.0 and cuDNN 7.3 support, using an NVIDIA RTX 2080 Ti (11GB). Everything else is the same.
body:
I ran `bazel clean` and tried again at head of Master, but I saw exactly the same array mismatch error.

Note that this time I compiled with CUDA 10.0 and cuDNN 7.3 support, using an NVIDIA RTX 2080 Ti (11GB). Everything else is the same.
